note.p: Education: St Paul's School; Trinity College, Cambridge; MA (fil nob 1648); Incorporated at Oxford (1649); Lincoln's Inn (admitted 1648)
Career: Fellow of All Souls', Oxford (1648)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Venn; Foster; Le Neve; McDonnell
Notes: Last in 1674 list. According to McDonnell he was still alive, though ill, in 1685
